text: Lanfert is a locality in the municipality Schmallenberg in the district Hochsauerlandkreis in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. The hamlet has 6 inhabitantsSchmallenberg.de: Inhabitants and lies in the northeast of the municipality of Schmallenberg at a height of around 505 m. Rellmecke borders on the villages of Bödefeld and Walbecke. The river Valme flows through the hamlet. ==References== Category:Villages in North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Schmallenberg
title: Lanfert
